testcase.name: Grant an access token with all permissions on all resource types with authorized uuid
testcase.system-out: {"expectations"=>{"pending"=>[], "failed"=>[], "succeeded"=>["Grant request with all permissions"]}, "validations"=>["The current document does not have any resource to match with."], "script"=>"grantAllPermissions"}

testcase.name: Grant an access token without an authorized uuid
testcase.system-out: {"expectations"=>{"pending"=>[], "failed"=>[], "succeeded"=>["Grant request without authorized uuid"]}, "validations"=>["The current document does not have any resource to match with."], "script"=>"grantWithoutAuthorizedUUID"}

testcase.name: Grant an access token successfully with an authorized uuid
testcase.system-out: {"expectations"=>{"pending"=>[], "failed"=>[], "succeeded"=>["Grant request with authorized uuid"]}, "validations"=>["The current document does not have any resource to match with."], "script"=>"grantWithAuthorizedUUID"}

testcase.name: Attempt to grant an access token with all permissions empty or false and expect a server error
testcase.system-out: {"expectations"=>{"pending"=>[], "failed"=>[], "succeeded"=>["Grant request without any permissions error"]}, "validations"=>["The current document does not have any resource to match with."], "script"=>"grantWithoutAnyPermissionsError"}

testcase.name: Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing a syntax error and expect a server error
testcase.system-out: {"expectations"=>{"pending"=>[], "failed"=>[], "succeeded"=>["Grant request with regexp syntax error"]}, "validations"=>["The current document does not have any resource to match with."], "script"=>"grantWithRegExpSyntaxError"}

testcase.name: Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing capturing groups and expect a server error
testcase.system-out: {"expectations"=>{"pending"=>[], "failed"=>[], "succeeded"=>["Grant request with regexp non capturing error"]}, "validations"=>["The current document does not have any resource to match with."], "script"=>"grantWithRegExpNonCapturingError"}

testcase.name: Validate that a token containing authorized uuid can be parsed correctly
Validate that a token containing uuid resource permissions can be parsed correctly
Validate that a token containing uuid pattern permissions can be parsed correctly
